course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Film Art and Cinema Culture
course.description: This course studies the fundamental aspects of film aesthetics, film history, film genres and cinema culture.

reviews.author: ac0207
reviews.comment_content: It is mainly about old to modern movies and the history of movie industry.
reviews.comment_teaching: The instructor is really good. She is very willing to interact with the students.
reviews.comment_grading: I think it's not hard to get a good grade. I have got around mean in the two quizzes and midterm. Not sure about the final essay. We almost have a full score in the group project but I don't think we have done particularly well.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is not that heavy, especially in summer semester. But there's a few readings every week and an online discussion after every lessons. I'll suggest you to read them if you are a movie lovers.

reviews.author: nwcheng
reviews.comment_content: The course talks about film industry from the earliest state in 1910s to present time. Each lesson the instructor will start with ppt slides talking about a period and then the other half of the class is just watching movies.
reviews.comment_teaching: The instructor is really nice and the film she chose is good.
reviews.comment_grading:
Attendance and Participation (10%)
Quizzes (5%)
Midterm Exam (20%)
Group Presentation and Discussion (25%): Discussion during tutorials and a presentation on a selected film topic.
Final Exam (40%): A take home essay, to be submitted at the last lecture.

I get full mark for participation, above mean for midterm, 24/25 in group presentation,4/5 in quiz, essay mark unknown.
Overall get A-.
reviews.comment_workload: Every lesson after watching the film, we have to answer a question regarding the content of the film. A short midterm is required, a few mc and a short analysis of a clip from a movie. Two quizzes on the required readings of the week, 5 mc questions each time , other readings no need to do. A final essay, choose one out of three topics, all about the films we have watched in class. A group presentation, project title is decided by the group, can have at least one consultation with the instructor.
